titles.title: A bill to limit the printing of the Congressional Record and the Senate Calendars, and for other purposes.
PAPER Act of 2018
PAPER Act of 2018
Preventing Additional Printing of Electronic Records Act of 2018
Preventing Additional Printing of Electronic Records Act of 2018
PAPER Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
Preventing Additional Printing of Electronic Records Act of 2018 or the PAPER Act of 2018
This bill limits the printing of the Congressional Record, the Senate Calendar of Business, and the Senate Executive Calendar by requiring the offices that receive printed copies to request the copies.
